CustomField.description: The unique, machine-readable name for this capability (tool). This is the "function name" the LLM will call. It must be unique within the scope of a single AI Agent Definition.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a unique, descriptive name for this tool (e.g., get_case_details, create_opportunity). Use lowercase with underscores. The AI uses this exact name to call the action.
CustomField.label: Capability Name
